LITURGY.Comment: No Divine Liturgy UNLESS Finding or 40 Martyrs

SAINT.Name: Monday of the Second Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 5th Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: O Thou that alone fashioned our hearts, remember that we are dust; condemn us not to the nethermost parts of the earth, O Sinless One.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Ye that fear the Lord, praise Him.
Ye that fear the Lord, praise Him.
SEXTE.STICHOS: O God my God, attend to me, why hast Thou forsaken me?

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6th Tone

SEXTE.STICHOS: The Lord is my shepherd, and I shall not want.
